db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: AudioListener will have only one global instance and you can either access it through the listener property of AudioEngine:
or alternatively, by defining an AudioListener outside AudioEngine:
This separate AudioListener definition is allowed to make QML bindings easier in some cases.

db:section.db:title: direction : vector3d
db:section.db:para: This property holds the normalized 3D direction vector of the listener.

db:section.db:title: engine : QtAudioEngine::AudioEngine
db:section.db:para: This property holds the reference to AudioEngine, and must only be set once.

db:section.db:title: gain : real
db:section.db:para: This property will modulate all audio output from audio engine instances.

db:section.db:title: position : vector3d
db:section.db:para: This property holds the 3D position of the listener.

db:section.db:title: up : vector3d
db:section.db:para: This property holds the normalized 3D up vector of the listener.

db:section.db:title: velocity : vector3d
db:section.db:para: This property holds the 3D velocity vector of the listener.
